DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect oral contraceptive serum free prostatic specific antigen ( PSA ) woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOD ) compare cyproterone compound .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Serum Prostatic Specific Antigen ( PSA ) After Cyproterone Compound Treatment Compared With Oral Contraceptives Pill Hirsute Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate effect oral contraceptive serum free prostatic specific antigen ( PSA ) woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOD ) compare cyproterone compound . This randomized clinical trial include 60 polycystic ovary syndrome patient hirsutism refer infertility reproductive health research center governmental public educational hospital Feb2007 till Dec 2007 . Polycystic ovary syndrome define diagnostic criterion 2003 census Rotterdam . Hirsutism define presence excessive hair body Ferriman -Gallway score 7 . Women receive hormone therapy last 3 month , diet herbal treatment exclude study . The exclusion criterion 's consisted Hyperprolactinemia , thyroid disorder , ovarian tumor Cushing disease . Hirsutism determine Ferriman-Gallway score record every patient . Blood sample serum PSA , hormonal profile include free testosterone , dehydroepiandrostenedione sulfate ( DHEAS ) 17-hydroxyprogesterone ( 17-OHP ) take baseline end treatment early follicular phase 3th 5th day menstrual cycle 8 AM . Patients divide randomly two treatment group accord computer base table . one group receive oral contraceptive pill one receive cyproterone acetate combine ethinyl-estradiol ( Diane ) 3 month . Hirsutism score evaluate treatment . The blood sample take early follicular phase 3 month treatment avoid pharmacological effect treatment serum PSA , free testosterone , DHEAS,17-OHP measure . The university ethic committee approve study inform consent obtain patient .
DOC.criteria: PCOS patient Women receive hormone therapy last 3 month , On diet Herbal treatment Hyperprolactinemia Thyroid disorder Ovarian tumor Cushing disease .
